thread.title: Sonnie Badu Is Not A Man Of God- Mzbel Opens Keys
thread.title_full: Sonnie Badu Is Not A Man Of God- Mzbel Opens Keys

author: Mzta Churchill
title: Sonnie Badu Is Not A Man Of God- Mzbel Opens Keys
text:
Ace Ghanaian musician, Mzbel has stated that Sonnie Badu is not a true man of God.
The actress made the shocking disclosure whilst speaking in an interview sighted by Gh Page.
After revealing what had been transpiring between her and him, the musician said that Ghanaians should not take him seriously because he is not a man of God.
Mzbel claims actions portrayed by the man of God contradict his duty as a man of God as he cited an instance.
Mzbel recounted how Dr. Sonnie bragged to her that he was richer than Shatta Wale and could do a lot of things the dancehall enigma could not do.
She stated that she would schedule a day to drop more shocking revelations about the man of God, but in the meantime, she wants Ghanaians to know that Sonnie Badu is not a man of God, so, Ghanaians should not accord him that respect
